metadata.title: CVE-2024-24860 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's bluetooth device driver in{min,max}_key_size_set() function. This can result in a null pointerdereference issue, possibly leading to a kernel panic or denial of serviceissue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-24860` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-228-generic - 4.15.0-228.240
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-228-generic - 4.15.0-228.240
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-228-lowlatency - 4.15.0-228.240
